sn35.139:1.2: Tam vo pahinam hitaya sukhaya bhavissati.
sn35.139:1.5: te pajahatha. Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.139:1.11: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti.
sn35.139:1.12: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam imasmim jetavane tinakattha …pe…
sn35.139:1.13: evameva kho, bhikkhave, rupa na tumhakam; te pajahatha.
sn35.139:1.14: Te vo pahina hitaya sukhaya bhavissanti”ti ….
